fields.name: Small Cottage
fields.description: A cozy open-air cottage perfect for small groups and day outings. Comes with lights, outlets, and trapal coverings for shade and rain protection.

fields.name: Dos Andanas Cottage Down
fields.description: Ground-level two-story cottage ideal for gatherings. Features a spacious covered area with lights, outlets, and trapal coverings.

fields.name: Dos Andanas Cottage Up
fields.description: Upper-level two-story cottage offering elevated views and a refreshing breeze. Includes lights, outlets, and trapal coverings.

fields.name: Large Cottage
fields.description: Spacious cottage that accommodates up to 20 persons — great for family reunions and bigger groups. Comes with lights, outlets, and trapal coverings.

fields.name: Dos Andanas Room w/ Cottage (Small)
fields.description: A private room paired with a cottage area. The room includes a queen-sized foam mattress and wall fan for a comfortable overnight stay.

fields.name: Dos Andanas Room w/ Cottage (Large)
fields.description: A larger private room with cottage area. Equipped with a queen-sized foam mattress and wall fan — perfect for groups wanting both indoor and outdoor space.

fields.name: Lavender House (Fully Furnished AC)
fields.description: Our premium fully furnished air-conditioned house. Features a queen-sized bed, pull-out bed, private toilet and bath, small refrigerator, cable TV, kitchen, clothing cabinet, microwave oven, water heater, and veranda seating.

fields.name: Air-Conditioned Karaoke Room
fields.description: An air-conditioned room with karaoke entertainment built in. Features an L-shaped sofa, queen-sized foam, TV, bluetooth speaker with mic, and a small refrigerator.

fields.name: Kubo Room & Cottage w/ Toilet
fields.description: A traditional kubo-style room with an attached cottage and private toilet & bath. Includes a queen-sized foam, single elevated bed, wall fan, and electrical outlets.

fields.name: Kubo Room & Cottage w/o Toilet
fields.description: A traditional kubo-style room with an attached cottage. Includes a queen-sized foam, single elevated bed, wall fan, and electrical outlets. Uses shared toilet & bath facilities.

fields.name: Function Hall
fields.description: A large function hall perfect for events, celebrations, and big gatherings. Accommodates up to 120 persons with 120 chairs, 15 tables, wall fans, lights, and outlets. 24-hour use included. Sound system available for an additional ₱500.

fields.name: Trapal Table
fields.description: A simple open-air table setup with bench seating and trapal covering — ideal for budget-friendly day trips and picnics by the beach.
